About

A boutique crypto-savvy law firm specializing in legal and blockchain development services. Uniquely positioned with the former SEC blockchain architect, a combined six decades of software development and federal and state litigation experience, our sophisticated clients demand a path upward and onward where none exists.

Services

Crypto Custodial Services, and Multi-Sig Administration;
Bespoke Solidity Development for Agreements, Services, Tokens, Governance;
Crypto-focus Estate Planning, Trusts, ICOs/STOs, Treasuries;
DAO Governance, Service Provider, Vetoer Roles;
Registration & Jurisdiction of Crypto-centric Foundations;
TributeDAO, JuiceBox/Projects, and Custom DAO Frameworks;
